Package main

Class Player

java.lang.Object
main.Player
public class Player extends Object
Stores information about the player and key variables for the game. It stores the player's Team, Items, current score, and current money It also stores the chosen difficulty, team size, max number of weeks and the current week, and an instance of the Random class. This classes' methods and variables are largely static since there should only ever be one instance.
Version:
1.11
Author:
mdi48, bsm62

    • randomStream

      public static Random randomStream

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, double diff, int weeks, int size)
      Constructor for the player. Initializes other variables to their default values, such as setting money and score to zero, and the current week to one. Also generates an empty Team with the players' chosen name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name the player has chosen for their team
      diff - the chosen difficulty (0.5 = easy, 1.0 = normal, 2.0 = hard)
      weeks - the number of weeks the game will run for
      size - the size of all teams in this game

  • Method Details

    • takeBye

      public static void takeBye()
      This is used to end the current week, performing a number of functions in the process. All Athletes will have their stamina restored to full, and the current week will be incremented. The Market will restock its' athletes and Items, and the Stadium will generate new Matches. There is also a chance of a RandomEvent being triggered.
